page.title: 02A Muslim living in Brixton.
page.content: My name is Ashraf. I come from Bangladesh. Now we live in Brixton. We can not go to our Mosque each week because they are far away. But my whole family prays five times a day. We live in a block of flats. It is not safe to go outside and walk on the paths alone ater 5 or 6pm especially when you are a muslim. My mum and my sister pray at home on special days, while me and my little brother and my dad go to the mosque. We believe in Muhammed. In 1983 I went to Bangladesh. I want to go again and my dad said I will go next year. In school nobody calls me names. I mostly make friends with muslims or other boys from other lands. In assembly when we say our prayers I dont say anything but I say a short prayer in my own language.
